name: intgr-surms.yml
configuration:
spring:
  jpa:
    properties:
      hibernate:
        dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.Oracle12cDialect
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  data:
    solr:
      user: "solr"
      pass: "SolrRocks"
      host: "http://10.28.97.89:8081/solr"
  jmx:
    default-domain: surms-jmx
  datasource:
    url: jdbc:oracle:thin:cms/cms@10.30.16.188:1521:mssmig1
    username: cms
    password: cms
    driver-class-name: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-surms
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://localhost:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
equipCron: "0 10 * * * *"
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
